TriggerOraclev10g.name: PROSSTAT_AUTOREC
TriggerOraclev10g.body:
DECLARE

/*???? ?????? ?????? ???? osd.process_status ?????? ??????? ?????? ????????.*/
/* This trigger to log actions into osd.process_status table */

v_location number;

BEGIN

IF DBMS_REPUTIL.FROM_REMOTE = FALSE THEN

if inserting then

if :new.rec_flag = 1 then

-------------------- ?????? ???? ??? ??????? ---------------------------
begin
select location into v_location
from main.departments
where department_no = :new.to_dept;
exception
when no_data_found then null;
end;


------------------- ?????? ???????? ----------------------------------
update osd.process_status set
rec_user = :new.rec_user,
rec_date = :new.rec_date,
time_flag = sysdate,
current_dept = :new.to_dept,
location = v_location
where process_no = :new.process_no ;

end if;

elsif updating then
update osd.process_status set
rec_user = :new.rec_user,
rec_date = :new.rec_date,
current_dept = :new.to_dept,
location = v_location
where process_no = :old.process_no ;

end if;
end if;

exception
when no_data_found then null;
END;
